title: S3 support looking for an ADC
body: I'm hard stuck in silver III, looking for someone to duo with in ranked!

replies.body: I main adc jungle playing vayne cait varus and miss fortune as an adc
Hi,what champions do you play? I can adc can play tristana and lucian in the process of learning more adc champs.
I'm decent on Sona, Soraka, Morgana, Lulu and Karma :)
